description: Remove deadwood, dead branches, and broken branch(es) as specified in Schedule of works January 2019 from the following trees (applicant's ref.):1 x Weeping Beech (1); 2 x Holly (16, 503); 8 x Yew (26/34, 84, 110, 303 - 305, 456, 536); 4 x Evergreen Oak (33, 421, 480, 510); 2 x Oak (75, 362); 2 x Hop Hornbeam (88, 90); 2 x Crab Apple (97, 479); 4 x Corsican Pine (104, 108, 109, 296); 1 x Horse Chestnut (111); 4 x Norway maple (122, 192, 505, 585); 1 x Fastigiate Oak (407); 4 x Grand Fir (426, 435, 457, 462); 1 x Walnut (427); 2 x Lawson Cypress (428, 458); 2 x Californian Redwood (429, 496); 1 x purple Plum (452); 1 x Plum fruited Yew (455); 6 x Cedar (459, 357, 171, 418, 449, 451); 1 x Medlar (460); 1 x London Plane (463); 1 x Pagoda tree (145); 1 x Judas tree (193); 1 x Copper Beech (195); 1 x Plum (204); 2 x Pedunculate Oak (342, 530); 2 x Sycamore (nr 353, 630); 1 x Mulberry (403); 1 x Cherry (582); 1 x Myrobalan Plum (524); 1 x Pin Oak (525); 1 x Wingnut (545); 1 x Dawn Redwood (560); 1 x Hungarian Oak (174); 1 x Larch (633); 1 x Single leaf Ash (469); 1 x Swamp Cypress (492); 1 x Magnolia (611); 2 x Field Maple (519, 520); 3 x Hawthorn (518, 542, 549).Remove dead tree (applicant's ref.) as specified in Schedule of works January 2019:1 x Holly (0110; 1 x Sycamore (082); 2 x Hawthorn (522, 568); 1 x Cherry (573)Treat shrub (applicant's ref.) as specified in Schedule of works January 2019:1 x Mahonia (nr 084); 1 x laurel (132); Elders (base of 285a, nr 499); All standing in area A1 of Tree Preservation Order
